officialTitle: Comparison Between 400 µg or 200 µg of Misoprostol for Cervical Dilatation in 1st Trimester Miscarriage - A Clinical Trial
inclusionCriteria:
* All patients admitted at the Gynecological emergency Unit at Hospital de Clínicas de Porto Alegre scheduled for uterine evacuation with \<12 weeks of gestation.
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 50 Years
